in the Asset

“ LioNets : Local_Interpretations_Of_Neural_Networks through Penultimate_Layer_Decoding ” ( https://www.ai4eu.eu/resource/lionets-local-interpretations-neural-networks-through-penultimate-layer-decoding ) In this asset , the code of LioNets ( v2.0 ) is supporting two python notebooks , which present two ways to interpret a binary classifier and a remaining useful lifetime predictor on the Turbofan_Engine_Degradation_Simulation_Dataset ( https://data.nasa.gov/dataset/Turbofan-engine-degradation-simulation-data-set/vrks-gjie )
In this asset
